TEXT.TITLE: NEW GENERATION PRODUCTS MAKES ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: <New Generation Products Inc> said it has acquired a 20 pct ownership in <Personal Protection Technolgies Inc>. New Generation said Personal Protection is developing a group of personal care products, which are effective in killing a variety of viruses and bacteria on contact, for U.S. and export markets. Reuter
